miniedit-form-publish: Label of the button to publish the changes
miniedit-form-cancel: Label of the button to cancel the edit
miniedit-form-summary: Label of the field to enter the edit summary
miniedit-form-minor: Label of the checkbox to mark the edit as minor
miniedit-form-saving: Text shown while saving the changes
miniedit-summary-edit: Edit summary when editing a paragraph
miniedit-summary-delete: Edit summary when deleting a paragraph
